title: Low priority que for avoiding a troll
body:
I waited out champ select bc two idiots were fighting over mid and they started making threats about trolling, I was like "fuck this I'm going to enjoy myself" and skipped the que.

Now I'm in low priority, riot where is the fucking better alternative?
You can't sweep this problem under the rug forever.

replies.body: Everyone has retards fighting in champ select at times, Just play the game. It all evens out in the end.
This is like a child complaining that they're in the naughty corner for hitting someone. They know they did the wrong thing but can't accept they're not above the rules.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YfNV0TnM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-26T13:19:44.973+0000)
>
> This is like a child complaining that they're in the naughty corner for hitting someone. They know they did the wrong thing but can't accept they're not above the rules.

It's not, I didn't want to have a miserable time because two idiots cracked the shits about not getting mid.

Because I don't care about getting a 5 minute wait for que skipping, I care about the fact I **HAD** to do it if I wanted some kind of decent game and then I get punished for it.

I care because there is no fucking system in place to stop you from having to play with someone when they in a tantrum say "imma just troll now" 

I actually struggle to imagine how you see that in my post unless you decided to not really read it and just think "I obviously stand the morale high ground, this kid is trying not to take responsibility over his actions just by the title I read"

"it's just another child as you said, complaining that they are not above the rules" 

Seriously, I wouldn't be surprised if you were holding tight to that statement waiting for a post like this one for you to use it on

I read your entire post and, honestly, it just seems like the petty complaints of a child. There is always a risk that someone will ruin the game, it happens. Complaining about it wont change that fact. If I get people ruining the game from champion select I play the game, deal with it, report them afterwards and get on with my life. I don't, however, feel the need to complain about it to other people on the boards.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YfNV0TnM,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-26T14:09:40.154+0000)

Complaining about it wont change that fact. If I get people ruining the game from champion select I play the game, deal with it, report them afterwards and get on with my life. I don't, however, feel the need to complain about it to other people on the boards.

Sure that is your opinion and your approach but it is my decision to post about it on the boards. And it is fine for you to waste your own time in a game but for me it isn't worth it.

Also it is REALLY petty to mark down everything I posted here (except maybe my first comment) 

One secret I would love to let you in on though... Sometimes your way doesn't fucking suit everyone so don't act like it should

> And it is fine for you to **waste your own time** in a game but for me it isn't worth it.

I don't see it as a waste though, I see it more as a challenge. I do my best to win despite the fact there's a troll in the game, even if I lose I usually learn something new. The way I see it is that you're the one wasting your time, but then again that's just a personal opinion.

> Also it is REALLY petty to mark down everything I posted here (except maybe my first comment)

Assuming, of course, I'm the one who downvoted them. You don't really have a way of knowing, do you? All I've done is downvote posts I disagree with, nothing more than I could easily assume you've done. That **is** one of the things what the up/down voting system is there for.
